Adaptability.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

Aerilate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves.

Aftermath.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

Analytic.description: Boosts move power when the Pokemon moves last.

Anger Point.description: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

Aroma Veil.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

Aura Break.description: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed.

Battery.description: Raises power of teammates' Special moves.

Battle Armor.description: The Pokemon is protected against critical hits.

Battle Bond.description: Transform into Ash-Greninja after causing opponent to faint.

Beast Boost.description: The Pokemon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokemon.

Berserk.description: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.

Big Pecks.description: Protects the Pokemon from Defense-lowering attacks.

Blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

Bulletproof.description: Protects the Pokemon from ball and bomb moves.

Cheek Pouch.description: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

Chlorophyll.description: Boosts the Pokemon's Speed in sunshine.

Clear Body.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering its stats.

Color Change.description: Changes the Pokemon's type to the foe's move.

Comatose.description: Prevents all status conditions except Sleep.

Competitive.description: Raises Special Attack when the Pokemon's stats are lowered.

Contrary.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Corrosion.description: The Pokemon can poison Steel and Poison types.

Cursed Body.description: May disable a move used on the Pokemon.

Cute Charm.description: Contact with the Pokemon may cause infatuation.

Damp.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

Dark Aura.description: Raises power of Dark type moves for all Pokemon in battle.

Dazzling.description: Protects the Pokemon from high-priority moves.

Defeatist.description: Lowers stats when HP drops below half.

Defiant.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

Delta Stream.description: Creates strong winds when the ability activates.

Desolate Land.description: Turns the sunlight extremely harsh when the ability activates.

Download.description: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

Drizzle.description: The Pokemon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

Drought.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokemon enters a battle.

Dry Skin.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

Early Bird.description: The Pokemon awakens quickly from sleep.

Effect Spore.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

Electric Surge.description: The Pokemon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.

Emergency Exit.description: The Pokemon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

Fairy Aura.description: Raises power of Fairy type moves for all Pokemon in battle.

Flame Body.description: Contact with the Pokemon may burn the attacker.

Flare Boost.description: Powers up special attacks when burned.

Flash Fire.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

Flower Gift.description: Powers up party Pokemon when it is sunny.

Flower Veil.description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokemon's stats.

Fluffy.description: Reduces damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

Forewarn.description: Determines what moves a foe has.

Frisk.description: The Pokemon can check a foe's held item.

Full Metal Body.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering its stats.

Galvanize.description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is booste

Gluttony.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

Gooey.description: Contact with the Pokemon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Grass Pelt.description: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

Grassy Surge.description: The Pokemon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

Guts.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

Harvest.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

Healer.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

Heatproof.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

Honey Gather.description: The Pokemon may gather Honey from somewhere.

Hustle.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

Hydration.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

Hyper Cutter.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering Attack stat.

Ice Body.description: The Pokemon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

Illuminate.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokemon.

Illusion.description: Comes out disguised as the Pokemon in back.

Immunity.description: Prevents the Pokemon from getting poisoned.

Imposter.description: It transforms itself into the Pokemon it is facing.

Infiltrator.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

Inner Focus.description: The Pokemon is protected from flinching.

Insomnia.description: Prevents the Pokemon from falling asleep.

Iron Barbs.description: Inflicts damage to the Pokemon on contact.

Iron Fist.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

Justified.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

Keen Eye.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering accuracy.

Klutz.description: The Pokemon can't use any held items.

Leaf Guard.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

Levitate.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

Lightning Rod.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

Limber.description: The Pokemon is protected from paralysis.

Liquid Ooze.description: Damages attackers using any draining move.

Liquid Voice.description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

Long Reach.description: The Pokemon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

Magic Guard.description: The Pokemon only takes damage from attacks.

Magician.description: The Pokemon steals the held item of a Pokemon it hits with a move.

Magma Armor.description: Prevents the Pokemon from becoming frozen.

Marvel Scale.description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

Mega Launcher.description: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.

Merciless.description: The Pokemon�s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

Minus.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokemon has Plus or Minus.

Misty Surge.description: The Pokemon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.

Mold Breaker.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Moody.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

Motor Drive.description: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

Moxie.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokemon.

Multiscale.description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Multitype.description: Changes type to match the held Plate.

Mummy.description: Contact with this Pokemon spreads this Ability.

Natural Cure.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

No Guard.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokemon land.

Normalize.description: All the Pokemon's moves become the Normal type.

Overcoat.description: Protects the Pokemon from damage from weather.

Overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

Own Tempo.description: Prevents the Pokemon from becoming confused.

Parental Bond.description: Allows the Pokemon to attack twice.

Pickpocket.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokemon.

Pickup.description: The Pokemon may pick up items.

Pixilate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.

Plus.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokemon has Plus or Minus.

Poison Heal.description: Restores HP if the Pokemon is poisoned.

Poison Point.description: Contact with the Pokemon may poison the attacker.

Poison Touch.description: May poison targets when a Pokemon makes contact.

Power Construct.description: Changes form when HP drops below half.

Power of Alchemy.description: The Pokemon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

Prankster.description: Gives priority to a status move.

Pressure.description: The Pokemon raises the foe's PP usage.

Primordial Sea.description: Makes it rain heavily when the ability activates.

Prism Armor.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

Protean.description: Changes the Pokemon's type to its last used move.

Psychic Surge.description: The Pokemon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.

Quick Feet.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

Rain Dish.description: The Pokemon gradually regains HP in rain.

Rattled.description: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

Receiver.description: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.

Reckless.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

Refrigerate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.

Regenerator.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

Rivalry.description: Deals more damage to a Pokemon of same gender.

RKS System.description: Changes type depending on held item.

Rock Head.description: Protects the Pokemon from recoil damage.

Rough Skin.description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

Run Away.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokemon.

Sand Force.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

Sand Rush.description: Boosts the Pokemon's Speed in a sandstorm.

Sand Stream.description: The Pokemon summons a sandstorm in battle.

Sand Veil.description: Boosts the Pokemon's evasion in a sandstorm.

Sap Sipper.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

Scrappy.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokemon.

Serene Grace.description: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

Shadow Shield.description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Shed Skin.description: The Pokemon may heal its own status problems.

Sheer Force.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

Shell Armor.description: The Pokemon is protected against critical hits.

Shield Dust.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Shields Down.description: Changes stats when HP drops below half.

Skill Link.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Slush Rush.description: Boosts the Pokemon�s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Sniper.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

Snow Warning.description: The Pokemon summons a hailstorm in battle.

Solar Power.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

Soul-Heart.description: Raises Special Attack when an ally faints.

Speed Boost.description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

Stakeout.description: Deals double damage to Pokemon switching in.

Stall.description: The Pokemon moves after all other Pokemon do.

Stance Change.description: Changes form depending on moves used.

Static.description: Contact with the Pokemon may cause paralysis.

Steadfast.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokemon flinches.

Stench.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

Sticky Hold.description: Protects the Pokemon from item theft.

Storm Drain.description: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

Strong Jaw.description: Boosts the power of biting moves.

Sturdy.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

Suction Cups.description: Negates all moves that force switching out.

Super Luck.description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

Swarm.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

Sweet Veil.description: Prevents the Pokemon and allies from falling asleep.

Swift Swim.description: Boosts the Pokemon's Speed in rain.

Symbiosis.description: The Pokemon can pass an item to an ally.

Synchronize.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

Tangled Feet.description: Raises evasion if the Pokemon is confused.

Tangling Hair.description: Contact with the Pokemon lowers the attacker�s Speed stat.

Technician.description: Powers up the Pokemon's weaker moves.

Telepathy.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

Teravolt.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Thick Fat.description: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Torrent.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

Tough Claws.description: Boosts the power of contact moves.

Toxic Boost.description: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

Trace.description: The Pokemon copies a foe's Ability.

Truant.description: Pokemon can't attack on consecutive turns.

Turboblaze.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Unaware.description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokemon.

Unburden.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

Unnerve.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

Victory Star.description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

Vital Spirit.description: Prevents the Pokemon from falling asleep.

Volt Absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

Water Absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

Water Bubble.description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokemon and prevents the Pokemon

Water Compaction.description: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.

Water Veil.description: Prevents the Pokemon from getting a burn.

Weak Armor.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

White Smoke.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering its stats.

Wimp Out.description: Switches out when HP drops below half.

Wonder Skin.description: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

Zen Mode.description: Changes form when HP drops below half.
